messages.input: Message from TURKEY:'Sorry for the deception -- I only decided at the last minute and I also didn't want any leaks getting to Italy'.
messages.output: You should cautiously trust the message. Turkey's apology for the deception and the explanation of decisions made last minute depicts a level of transparency in their communication. Stay vigilant and ensure clear communication moving forward to maintain a solid partnership.

messages.message: Yeah, sorry. For what its worth I fuckin' hate doing this whole 'betrayal' thing to people. It's the worst part of this game. >.>
